thread.title: Not without my daughter: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
thread.title_full: Not without my daughter: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna | From the print edition
title: Not without my daughter: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
text:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, who makes her comeback in Jazbaa this week is set to leave for London on October 12 — a day after her father-in-law’s birthday, for a long shooting stint of her next film Karan Johar’s Ae Dil Hai Mushkil .
She will be in London for three weeks, and will celebrate her birthday there. Daughter Aaradhya accompanies her.
Ash confirms, “Of course, Aaradhya accompanies me. All my shooting schedules will be planned as per her convenience.”
The little Bachchan won’t be missing much school when she zips off to London to be with her mom. “It will be just a little while before her holidays, so not much of school to be missed,” says Ash.
Aishwarya brings in her birthday on November 1 in London with Karan Johar and her co-stars. And yes , Abhishek will join her for the occasion.
“I am in a happy space right now. Jazbaa has been very well received. It is almost like the five years that I was away have dissolved,” she concludes.
